sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import moment from 'moment' import Carousel from '../Carousel' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { GLOBALTYPES } from '../../redux/actions/globalTypes' import { getPost } from '../../redux/actions/postAction' import {FiMoreHorizontal, FiTrash} from 'react-icons/fi' import {MdCreate} from 'react-icons/md' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const PostInfo = ({post}) => { const postId = useParams() console.log(postId) const { auth, detailPost } = useSelector(state => state) const dispatch = useDispatch() // useEffect(() => { // dispatch(getPost({detailPost, postId, auth})) // }, [detailPost, dispatch, postId, auth]) const handleEditPost = (e) => { dispatch({ type: GLOBALTYPES.STATUS, payload: {...post, onEdit: true }}) } return (
{ auth.user._id === postId.id._id && <>
Edit Post
Remove Post
}
{post.title}

{post.salary}$ Avg.Hour

Skill: {post.skillRequired}

Description: {post.description}

Open: {moment(post.createAt).format('DD/MM/YYYY')}

Deadlines: {moment(post.deadlines).format('DD/MM/YYYY')}

{ post.images.length > 0 && <>
Detail Description
}
) } export default PostInfo
